trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of input that the grammar, defined by the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />, will match.
trans-unit.target: 表示文法會比對的輸入類型，<see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> 所定義。

trans-unit.source: The input mode for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> is determined by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property.
The default input mode is Voice, which indicates that the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: 預設值輸入的模式是指出所定義之文法的語音<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>會比對的語音輸入。

trans-unit.source: The Dtmf mode indicates that a grammar will match Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) tones instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: Dtmf 模式表示文法會比對雙重撥號音後開始多頻率 (DTMF) 色調，而不是語音。

trans-unit.source: There are 16 DTMF tones, 12 of which are commonly found on most telephones.
trans-unit.target: 有 16 DTMF 撥號音，其中 12 常見大部分的電話。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object will match the type of input specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property, which gets an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件從<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件會比對所指定的輸入類型<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>屬性，取得的執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object will match DTMF tones similar to those found on a telephone, instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> 物件將會比對類似常見於電話之撥號音的 DTMF 撥號音，而不比對語音。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object will match speech input.
